ing: 1 large mango - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
des: "Slush is a frozen drink which is made by frozen juice or pulp. Here I have made a combination slush with two flavorful fruits. Mango orange slush is a great drink for summer. I hope you guys will enjoy this drink."
ins: Blend mango, ice, orange juice, water, lime juice, ginger juice, and brown sugar together in a blender until slushy, 2 to 3 minutes.
